name: Stella
description: Stella project - Makes it easy and fun to use Whatsapp..

STELLA_STRING.description: Put here the string you got from whatsapp or from replit.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language.  Español => ES, English => en

AUTO_BİO.description: Set true to add automatic date and time to the state. Set true for auto date, time in biography.

FULL_EVA.description: Turn your account into a chatbot!

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: message read part, set true or false if you want the message to be read or not.

HEROKU.description: If HEROKU is running, set true.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable MUTE message! Use: default to change later.

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable message from UNMUTE! Use: default to change later.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: How to use the BOT. If you use public others can use the BOT, if you use private only you can use it

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: Put here your key obtained in https://remove.bg

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive message! Use: default to change later.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable BAN message! Use: default to change later.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Autoexpulsion message! Use: default to change later.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote message! Use: default to change later.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote message! Use: default to change later.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable message from AFK! Use: default to change later.

GAN_IMAGE.description: Write image link for Gan Style plugin.

NO_ONLINE.description: Enter true if you don't want to appear online.
